turns.answer:
I am trying to get you to answer 'No' and one short sentence.

Example: You are playing Mafia 2. You win in the single elimination game and are asked to answer 'Yes' or 'No'.

Question
turns.label: lie

turns.answer:
I was driving by the pool with my friend.

When you drive to the pool, it is an hour before 9 pm. As the pool closes at noon, if you are late to play you will be unable to play.
